view?"}]}],"mode":"simple"},"confirmMessage":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"acknowledgeMsg":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"skippable":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"skipReprompt":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"defaultValue":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"variableId":"ebf637a75914496ca3caca5361f2f2cf","detailDescription":"","id":"beb91e2244724f2f82c45a753bd45d8b","stepType":"ChoicePrompt","hasCardHeader":false,"cardMetadata":{"mode":"card","metadataScript":"","cardTemplate":"","cardFields":{},"cardDefinition":{}},"withNluUserInput":false,"skipIfFulfilled":false},"d6805d777c39427c986adb9c1f77ae9d":{"id":"d6805d777c39427c986adb9c1f77ae9d","stepType":"TextOutput","name":"Confirm NeedIt Type","secure":false,"value":[{"value":"(function execute() {
 // Return the display value (Label) for the needit_type choice
 return 'You selected: ' + vaInputs.needit_type.getDisplayValue();
})()
","mode":"script"}],"requestFeedback":true,"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"88509943491248e3898cb56d80d0dcd5":{"name":"NeedIt List","prompt":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"Select a NeedIt record to view."}]}],"mode":"simple"},"confirmMessage":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"acknowledgeMsg":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"skippable":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"skipReprompt":{"value":"","mode":"query"},"defaultValue":{"value":"","mode":"simple"},"variableId":"c99e00b5057e4216b2a09a2bbee86908","detailDescription":"","id":"88509943491248e3898cb56d80d0dcd5","stepType":"ReferenceChoicePrompt","mode":"glide_record","script":"","metadataScript":"","cardData":{},"noRecordsResponseMsg":{"value":[{"type":"paragraph","children":[{"text":"You have no open NeedIt records."}]}],"mode":"simple"},"condition":{"mode":"glide_scripted_query","value":"(function execute(table) {
 // Initialize an array for the list of NeedIt records to show
 var options = [];
 
 // Query the table selected in the Table field for active records with the 
 // u_request_type selected in the NeedIt Type node where the user is the 
 // u_requested_for. Order the results by the When needed value.
 var grNI = new GlideRecord(table);
 grNI.addQuery('u_request_type',vaInputs.needit_type.getValue());
 grNI.addQuery('active','true');
 grNI.addQuery('u_requested_for',vaInputs.user);
 grNI.orderBy('u_when_needed');
 grNI.query();
 
 // Push a value and label pair to the array for each record the query returns.
 // The value is the unique value. The label is the number, u_when_needed, and
 // short_description values for the NeedIt record.
 while(grNI.next()) {
 options.push({ 'value': grNI.getUniqueValue(), 'label': grNI.getValue('number') + " (" + grNI.getDisplayValue('u_when_needed') + "): " + grNI.getValue('short_description') });
 }
 
 // Return the array
 return options;
})(table)
"},"hasCardHeader":false,"cardMetadata":{"mode":"card","metadataScript":"","cardTemplate":"","cardFields":{},"cardDefinition":{}},"withNluUserInput":false,"skipIfFulfilled":false},"80d7289b11404972920064e3cab4d0fa":{"id":"80d7289b11404972920064e3cab4d0fa","stepType":"RecordOutput","name":"NeedIt  // If Live Chat is available, inform users they will be transfered to a live agent
 // otherwise, let them know how to work with more NeedIt records
 if (vaSystem.isLiveAgentAvailable()){
 return 'You have reached your NeedIt search limit. I will transfer you to a live agent for assistance.'
 } else {
 return 'You have reached your NeedIt search limit. If you need to work with multiple NeedIt records, open NeedIt > My NeedIt Requests.'
 }
})()
","mode":"script"}],"requestFeedback":true,"applicability":{"value":"","mode":"query"}},"e8bae0e4fc3a43c38ee898a0a2919546":{"id":"e8bae0e4fc3a43c38ee898a0a2919546","name":"Transfer to Agent","script":"(function execute() {

})()

 // otherwise, return false
 if (vaSystem.isLiveAgentAvailable()){
 return true;
 } else {
 return false;
 }
})()

 // If the value of search_count is less than 3, return true
 // otherwise, return false
 if (vaVars.search_count < 3)

 else
